text: Michael Müller (born 9 December 1964) is a German politician. He was the Mayor of Berlin from 11 December 2014 to 21 December 2021. He is a member of the Social Democratic Party of Germany. He was President of the Bundesrat from November 2017 until October 2018, which made him deputy to the President of Germany. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Berlin
title: Michael Müller (politician)
